title: President Rajapaksa visits Russia to attend International Economic Forum
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa left for Russia this morning on 16th June to participate in the “15th St. Petersburg international Economic Forum”.  He reached Russia to a very warm welcome, unveiling another new chapter in relations between the two countries. The President was warmly welcomed by…
